properties.displayName: MCSB Baseline item DP-5 for Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server

metadata.offeringName: Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server

features.featureName: Data at Rest Encryption Using CMK
features.featureDescription: Data at-rest encryption using customer-managed keys is supported for customer content stored by the service.
features.featureGuidance: There is no current Microsoft guidance for this feature configuration. Please review and determine if your organization wants to configure this security feature.
features.customerActionsDescription: Use customer-managed key option in data at rest encryption when required
